text: Landelino Lavilla Alsina (6 August 1934 – 13 April 2020) was a Spanish lawyer and politician. He was born in Lerida, Spain. Lavilla Alsina was a member of the Union of the Democratic Centre. Lavilla Alsina was the Minister of Justice from 1976 to 1979. He was a Senator from 1977 to 1979. He was also a member of the Congress of Deputies from 1979 to 1983 and President of the Congress of Deputies from 1979 to 1982. Lavilla Alsina died in Madrid of a long-illness on 13 April 2020, aged 85.Muere Landelino Lavilla, ministro de Justicia con Suárez y presidente del Congreso el 23-F ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish lawyers Category:Presidents of the Congress of Deputies (Spain) Category:People from Lleida
title: Landelino Lavilla Alsina
